trans-unit.source: HTTP status codes
trans-unit.target: HTTP status codes

trans-unit.source: HTTP status codes (Azure Search)
trans-unit.target: HTTP status codes (Azure Search)

trans-unit.source: This page describes the HTTP status codes that are frequently returned when using the Azure Search API.
trans-unit.target: This page describes the HTTP status codes that are frequently returned when using the Azure Search API.

trans-unit.source: Common HTTP status codes
trans-unit.target: Common HTTP status codes

trans-unit.source: Code
trans-unit.target: Code

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: 200 OK
trans-unit.target: 200 OK

trans-unit.source: Success on GET, PUT, or POST.
trans-unit.target: Success on GET, PUT, or POST.

trans-unit.source: 204 Accepted
trans-unit.target: 204 Accepted

trans-unit.source: Success on PUT or POST.
trans-unit.target: Success on PUT or POST.

trans-unit.source: Index or documents uploaded successfully.
trans-unit.target: Index or documents uploaded successfully.

trans-unit.source: 207 Multi-Status
trans-unit.target: 207 Multi-Status

trans-unit.source: Partial success for PUT or POST.
trans-unit.target: Partial success for PUT or POST.

trans-unit.source: Some documents succeeded, but at least one failed.
trans-unit.target: Some documents succeeded, but at least one failed.

trans-unit.source: 400 Bad Request
trans-unit.target: 400 Bad Request

trans-unit.source: Returned when there is an error in the request URI, headers, or body.
trans-unit.target: Returned when there is an error in the request URI, headers, or body.

trans-unit.source: The response body will contain an error message explaining what the specific problem is.
trans-unit.target: The response body will contain an error message explaining what the specific problem is.

trans-unit.source: 403 Forbidden
trans-unit.target: 403 Forbidden

trans-unit.source: Returned when you pass an invalid api-key.
trans-unit.target: Returned when you pass an invalid api-key.

trans-unit.source: 404 Not Found
trans-unit.target: 404 Not Found

trans-unit.source: Returned when a resource does not exist on the server.
trans-unit.target: Returned when a resource does not exist on the server.

trans-unit.source: If you are managing or querying an index, check the syntax and verify the index name is specified correctly.
trans-unit.target: If you are managing or querying an index, check the syntax and verify the index name is specified correctly.

trans-unit.source: 429 Too Many Requests
trans-unit.target: 429 Too Many Requests

trans-unit.source: If this error occurs while you are trying to create an index, it means you already have the maximum number of indexes allowed for your pricing tier.
trans-unit.target: If this error occurs while you are trying to create an index, it means you already have the maximum number of indexes allowed for your pricing tier.

trans-unit.source: A count of the indexes stored in Azure Search is visible in the search service dashboard on the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Preview portal</linkText><linkUri>https://portal.azure.com</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: A count of the indexes stored in Azure Search is visible in the search service dashboard on the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Preview portal</linkText><linkUri>https://portal.azure.com</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: To view the indexes by name, click the <ui>Index</ui> tile.
trans-unit.target: To view the indexes by name, click the <ui>Index</ui> tile.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can also get a list of the indexes by name using the <languageKeyword>List Indexes</languageKeyword> operation.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, you can also get a list of the indexes by name using the <languageKeyword>List Indexes</languageKeyword> operation.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="54c762c8-805d-4319-844d-d3669bb63521" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List indexes (Azure Search API)</link> for details.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="54c762c8-805d-4319-844d-d3669bb63521" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List indexes (Azure Search API)</link> for details.

trans-unit.source: If this error occurs during document upload, it indicates that you've exceeded your quota on the number of documents per index.
trans-unit.target: If this error occurs during document upload, it indicates that you've exceeded your quota on the number of documents per index.

trans-unit.source: You must either create a new index or upgrade for higher capacity limits.
trans-unit.target: You must either create a new index or upgrade for higher capacity limits.

trans-unit.source: 502 Bad Gateway
trans-unit.target: 502 Bad Gateway

trans-unit.source: This error occurs when you enter HTTP instead of HTTPS in the connection.
trans-unit.target: This error occurs when you enter HTTP instead of HTTPS in the connection.

trans-unit.source: 503 Service Unavailable
trans-unit.target: 503 Service Unavailable

trans-unit.source: This error means that the system is under heavy load and your request can't be processed at this time.
trans-unit.target: This error means that the system is under heavy load and your request can't be processed at this time.

trans-unit.source: In this case, we highly recommend that your client code back off and wait before retrying.
trans-unit.target: In this case, we highly recommend that your client code back off and wait before retrying.

trans-unit.source: This will give the system some time to recover, increasing the chances that future requests will succeed.
trans-unit.target: This will give the system some time to recover, increasing the chances that future requests will succeed.

trans-unit.source: Rapidly retrying your requests will only prolong the situation.
trans-unit.target: Rapidly retrying your requests will only prolong the situation.

trans-unit.source: 504: Gateway Timeout
trans-unit.target: 504: Gateway Timeout

trans-unit.source: Azure Search listens on HTTPS port 443.
trans-unit.target: Azure Search listens on HTTPS port 443.

trans-unit.source: If your search service URL contains HTTP instead of HTTPS, a 504 status code will be returned.
trans-unit.target: If your search service URL contains HTTP instead of HTTPS, a 504 status code will be returned.
